comments.body: Random thought / feel free to ignore: can this just be an anonymous mockito?

This is more a fake than a mock, we have a bunch of ImageProvider subclasses that instantiates the image stream in different ways. This fake is another ImageProvider subclass that is just handed a ready codec at construction time.

To replace this with a mock we'll have to build a partial mock (as we want the code from the base ImageProvider unmocked). IMO that will feel a bit dirty.
